nodes.text: Kallabow (meaning "wild worker" in Shyriiwook) was a female Wookiee who was the daughter of Attichitcuk, the sister of Chewbacca, the wife of Mahraccor, and the mother of Lowbacca and Sirrakuk. She had blue eyes and dark-reddish brown fur. She and Mahraccor worked at the computer fabrication plant in Thikkiiana City on Kashyyyk.
